entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run` should be able to default to a viable TFM when running a multi-targeted project #38990
  • dotnet test html logger throws execption when using special characters in DataRow attributes. #38983
  • Certain .editorconfig rules are ignored in 8.0.200 and newer versions #38980
  • Introduce "bint" as a new keyword for BigInteger #38979
  • GenAPI needs to cast long value to EventKeywords enum #38977

Closed

  • Razor references version '4.10.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.9.0.0' #38942
  • [ dotnet-8.0.200-rtm.24069.25] dotnet tool install command doesn't show install successful message #38355

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Refactor and cleanup Static Web Assets infrastructure #38981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use `Convert.ToHexStringLower` #38965
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Branding for Preview 3 🐺 #38987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #38967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Remove getX MSBuild flags from restore invocation #38956
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
